## Variables

Let's create some example variables.

```{ojs}
a = 10
b = a + epsilon
```

```{ojs}
//| echo: false
viewof epsilon = Inputs.range([-1, 1], {label: "epsilon", step: 0.01})
```

We have created variables `a` = ${a} and `b` = ${b.toFixed(2)}.

## Plotting

Now let's make simple plots of the data:

```{ojs}
//| code-fold: true
data = [{a: a, b: b}]

Plot
  .rectX(data, {x: "b"})
  .plot({x: {domain: [9, 11]}})
```

```{ojs}
//| code-fold: true
Plot
  .dot(data, {x: "b", y: "a"})
  .plot({x: {domain: [9, 11]}, y: {domain: [9, 11]}})
```
